details.location: The Hills Hotel, Laguna Hills, California

submission_instructions.manuscript_format: 8-page (regular), 4-page (short), and 2-page (poster and demo) manuscript in double-column IEEE format

paper_evaluation.review_process: At least three experts will review submissions
paper_evaluation.presentation_requirement: Authors of accepted papers must present at the conference
paper_evaluation.originality_policy: Only original material where copyright is owned by authors and not under review elsewhere

awards.quality_papers: Distinguished quality papers will qualify for best paper/poster awards
awards.publication: Selected papers will be published in internationally renowned journals

community_invitation.description: Join the AIxSE community to receive announcements and notifications
